mapper.sql: SYSTEM_CD, PROJECT_CD, TICKET_NO, REVISION_NO, STATUS_CD, DEPLOY_CD, NOTE, BIKO, YUKO_FLAG, INS_DATE, INS_USER_ID, UPD_DATE, UPD_USER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TODO_LIST
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TODO_LIST (SYSTEM_CD, PROJECT_CD, TICKET_NO, REVISION_NO, STATUS_CD, DEPLOY_CD, NOTE, BIKO, YUKO_FLAG, INS_DATE, INS_USER_ID, UPD_DATE, UPD_USER_ID) values (#{systemCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ticketNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{revisionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deployCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{biko,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yukoFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{insDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{insUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update TODO_LIST
SYSTEM_CD = #{row.systemCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_CD = #{row.projectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TICKET_NO = #{row.ticketNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REVISION_NO = #{row.revisionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_CD = #{row.statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPLOY_CD = #{row.deployCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE = #{row.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIKO = #{row.biko,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YUKO_FLAG = #{row.yukoFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
INS_DATE = #{row.insDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INS_USER_ID = #{row.insUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPD_DATE = #{row.updDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPD_USER_ID = #{row.updUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update TODO_LIST set SYSTEM_CD = #{row.systemCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_CD = #{row.projectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TICKET_NO = #{row.ticketNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REVISION_NO = #{row.revisionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{row.statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPLOY_CD = #{row.deployCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{row.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIKO = #{row.biko,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YUKO_FLAG = #{row.yukoFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, INS_DATE = #{row.insDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INS_USER_ID = #{row.insUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_DATE = #{row.updDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPD_USER_ID = #{row.updUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TODO_LIST
REVISION_NO = #{revisionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPLOY_CD = #{deployCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIKO = #{biko,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YUKO_FLAG = #{yukoFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
INS_DATE = #{insDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INS_USER_ID = #{insUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPD_DATE = #{updDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPD_USER_ID = #{updUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SYSTEM_CD = #{systemCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PROJECT_CD = #{projectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TICKET_NO = #{ticketNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TODO_LIST set REVISION_NO = #{revisionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPLOY_CD = #{deployCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIKO = #{biko,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YUKO_FLAG = #{yukoFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, INS_DATE = #{insDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INS_USER_ID = #{insUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_DATE = #{updDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPD_USER_ID = #{updUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SYSTEM_CD = #{systemCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PROJECT_CD = #{projectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TICKET_NO = #{ticketNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.SYSTEM_CD , b.SYSTEM_NAME , a.PROJECT_CD , c.PROJECT_NAME , a.TICKET_NO , a.REVISION_NO , a.STATUS_CD , d.CD_NAME as STATUS_NM , a.DEPLOY_CD , e.CD_NAME as DEPLOY_NM , a.NOTE , a.BIKO , a.YUKO_FLAG
FROM TODO_LIST a inner join M_SYSTEM b on a.SYSTEM_CD = b.CD inner join M_PROJECT c on a.SYSTEM_CD = c.SYSTEM_CD and a.PROJECT_CD = c.CD left join M_CODE d on a.STATUS_CD = d.CD and d.GR_CD = '001' left join M_CODE e on a.DEPLOY_CD = e.CD and e.GR_CD = '002'
ORDER BY a.SYSTEM_CD, a.PROJECT_CD, a.TICKET_NO
